charges.charge_disposition: It is the jdgmnt of the crt that the dft is hereby comm to the cust of the BOP to be impris for a term of 121 mos as to ct one. Upon rel frm impris, the dft shall be plc on supv rel for a term of 3 yrs on the fol terms and cond: (1) that the dft shall cmply w/the rules and reg of the PO and GO 318; and (2) that the dft shall particpate, as instruc by PO, in a prog apprvd by the PO, for treatmnt of narcotic addic or drug dep, which may include cnsling and tsting, to determine if the dft has reverted to the use of drugs. It is ord that pus to sect 5E1.2(f) of the guidelines, all fns wvd, includ the csts of impris and supv, as it is found that the dft does not have the ability to pay. It is fur ord that the dft shall pay to the U.S. a s/a of $50.00. It is recom that BOP designate So CA as the place of incarceration. (1)
